General.Name: Bliss Properti Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Bliss Properti Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property business in Indonesia. The company operates shopping centers, hotels, and other facilities; and offers mall management and property services. It also engages in trading and investment activities. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bliss Properti Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bintang Baja Hitam.
General.Address: Millennium Centennial Center, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12920
